document_data.caption: A map showing the Genies' Anvil in the heart of the High Desert.
document_data.name: Genies' Anvil
document_data.mainbody: The '''Genies' Anvil''', also called '''Saddan al-Jinn''', was a barren stretch of land in the [[High Desert]] of [[Zakhara]] laying between the [[Mountains of Forgotten Dreams]] and the [[Mountains of the Lizard's Tongue]].
document_data.Geography/Ecology: Many dangerous obstacles threatened would-be travelers in this land. Vicious dust storms could blind riders so they could not even see the ears of their camels. Rain rarely fell, and sources of water were practically non-existent. Scorching daytime temperatures could be followed by freezing nights.
document_data.Inhabitants: Aside from its nasty weather, the Genies' Anvil was also home to the [[House of Sihr]], a tribe of [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] [[jann]]. Amir [[Bouladin al-Mutajalli]], their leader, had a reputation for ruthlessness.
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Tomb of Anak-Raya]]: This old burial site stored the ''[[Scrolls of Destiny]]''.{{Cite dragon/257/Hammer & Anvil|88-93}}
